text: Erica Lei Leerhsen (born February 14, 1976) is an American actress. She played Connie in Anything Else. She also played Amanda Bowles in the television show The Guardian Leerhsen was born in New York City. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:1976 births Category:Living people
title: Erica Leerhsen
